casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Quincey Lamar HILL. No. 150P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Quincey Lamar Hill, Bayboro, for Hill, Quincey Lamar. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of April 2015 by Defendant for Request for Counsel:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
BEASLEY, J. recused.
